messages.subject: schools leaving us alone
messages.msgSnippet: ... I beg to differ. IMO it is highly dependent on the area. Even here, in supposedly liberal WA state, I have friends who have just in the past year been
messages.messageBody:
At 06:49 PM 8/8/02 +0000, you wrote:
><<That's why they won't leave us alone,>>
>
>Schools ARE leaving us alone.

I beg to differ. IMO it is highly dependent on the area. Even here, in
supposedly liberal WA state, I have friends who have just in the past year
been harrassed, lied to, and threatened by the school district. The
overzealous nature with the belief that all children must fit into the same
mold was evident by the incidents that went on.What you state may hold true
for your area, but it does not change how it is for many others in many areas.

Tanya
